entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `IReadOnlyList<TElement>` to System.Linq.Grouping<TKey, TElement> #92165
  • [Perf] Triage backlog #92164
  • [PERF] Regressions in WASM AOT x64 in Logging.Formatting and IndexOf #92163
  • [PERF] Regression in Math.Single and Char_IsLower Benchmarks on Ubuntu Arm64 #92162
  • [PERF] Windows x86 Regression in BilinearTest.Interpol_AVX #92161
  • System.IO.Directory.GetFiles with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories not working on network drive #92152
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator shouldn't generate empty methods #92151
  • AzDo uploading failure: "Blob is incomplete" #92148
  • Support direct P/Invokes without an import library. #92140
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator throws on an abstract member rather than binding to existing value #92137
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory methods for collections in System.Collections.Generic #92133
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for attributes on fields/properties/events #92131
    Future
  • RandomNumberGenerator bad performance on GetString and possible reason #92130
    Future
  • [mono][ios] Tests failing 'JIT_SIMD' on ios/tvos devices #92129
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #92117
  • Uninstalling windows hosting bundle not working #92115
  • Why DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent not working? #92113
  • "dotnet nuget" results in "Internal CLR error" #92146
  • `TypeLoadException` has no message when issued from a single file app #92111
  • [mono] mono_gc_init_finalizer_thread #92110
  • NativeAOT compilation issue on IOS ARM64 - losing interface members? #92106
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a configurable overload of MemoryCacheEntryOptions for the commonly used method GetOrCreate in MemoryCacheExtension #92101
  • Can't build large webassembly project in .net8 in Release/AOT #92100
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #92098
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Xamarin.Android] Performance regression between net7 and net8 #89880
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Text.Json documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88577
    8.0.0
  • ILLink reports duplicate warnings from properties in some cases #83581
    Future
  • dotnet publish command fails with error NETSDK1144: Optimizing assemblies for size failed #92064
    8.0.0
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: Error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error #91880
    8.0.0
  • App hangs on macOS / Apple Silicon when run under Rosetta #76356
    Future
  • Remotely debugging .NET 7 apps in linux-arm environments causes segmentation fault #81921
    8.0.0
  • [Proposal]: Make MemoryStream use an unrolled linked list as the internal buffer #92078
  • P/Invoke doesn't work after CharSet.Unicode is set #92105
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-41355 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #60301
    5.0.0
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute crashes with exit code 139 #92104
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo` #90852
    Future
  • [Http Metrics] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91909
    8.0.0
  • Config binder generator generates uncompilable code when a private nested type is used #90909
    8.0.0
  • JSON serialization -- int to string. -- exception #92091
  • Test failure profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #91976
    9.0.0
  • Additional read from memory when reading a field in a struct #92093

PullRequests

Created

  • Add attribute analysis for missing cases in ILLink analyzer #92166
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix URL for syslib diagnostics #92160
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2268640 #92159
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a few missing xml comments for APIs in threading and tasks #92157
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Address some `SString` const issues #92156
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92155
    needs-area-label
  • Add remaining set of TensorPrimitives APIs for .NET 8 #92154
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0] Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92153
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • add packaging for linux-musl #92145
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO
  • [release/8.0] Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92144
    blocking-release, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • 6 more naive methods for Tensor Primitives. #92142
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92141
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92139
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Check if bbNatLoopNum is not NOT_IN_LOOP #92132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92125
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #92118
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Extract all side effects of the index in optRemoveRangeCheck #92116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92114
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92082
    blocking-release, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Fix URL for syslib diagnostics #92134
    needs-area-label
  • Start running test added in #89061 #91780
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Switch macOS to mmap thunks like iOS platforms #92136
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92094
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add missing STJ xml docs #92138
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0] fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92103
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92088
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92107
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91627
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Generate scripts to run with node. #92099
    arch-wasm, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Update installation process of nodejs 18.x to move away from the #92069
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Remove unnecessary use of UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile #91935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92075
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2267864 #92090
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add SHUTDOWNGUARD to NonGcHeapProfiler::ObjectAllocated #92096
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Implement Linq AggregateBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #92089
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove public provider from rundown session #92048
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use runsettings.targets to generate runsettings for host tests in local builds #92083
    area-Host
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92085
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
